alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 12:27PM CDT until July 17 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Foraker, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Pawhuska... Hominy... Fairfax... Barnsdall... Shidler... Wynona... Burbank... Grainola... Foraker... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Webb City... Tallant... Apperson... Pershing... Nelagoney... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
